[The next two weeks are [Go quiet weeks for the holidays](https://groups.google.com/g/golang-dev/c/wAVzevRS1LE).
Hope you all have a happy and restful holiday season! See you in 2022.]

**2021-12-15 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor**

**Accepted**

- **cmd/compile: clarify whether "-l" and "-N" compiler flags are actually supported** [#49390](https://golang.org/issue/49390)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/tls: add VersionName function to return a string version of the TLS Version** [#46308](https://golang.org/issue/46308)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/sys/windows/namedpipe: new package** [#49650](https://golang.org/issue/49650)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **go test -errfuzz flag to randomize error strings** [#49358](https://golang.org/issue/49358)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **runtime: allow N goroutines to be simultaneously locked to the same OS thread** [#49848](https://golang.org/issue/49848)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **spec: add comparable w/o interfaces** [#49587](https://golang.org/issue/49587)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **strings: add a Join method to Builder** [#49546](https://golang.org/issue/49546)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **sync: add method Mutex.Locked(func())** [#49563](https://golang.org/issue/49563)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **x/crypto/bcrypt: make compatible with OpenBSD** [#46940](https://golang.org/issue/46940)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **net: add context-aware Dialer methods DialTCP, DialUDP, DialIP, DialUnix** [#49097](https://golang.org/issue/49097)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **runtime: automatically bump RLIMIT\_NOFILE on Linux?** [#46279](https://golang.org/issue/46279)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **net/netip: add Unmap() to netip.Is4()** [#49970](https://golang.org/issue/49970)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **runtime: add block/wake function** [#46431](https://golang.org/issue/46431)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Active**

- **archive/tar: add FileInfoHeaderNoNames** [#50102](https://golang.org/issue/50102)
  - added to minutes
  - commented

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing
- **io/fs: add ReadLinkFS interface** [#49580](https://golang.org/issue/49580)
  - commented
- **net/http: add Unregister method to ServeMux** [#50056](https://golang.org/issue/50056)
  - added to minutes
  - commented
- **net: add Listen and Dial for TCP and UDP that takes an AddrPort** [#49522](https://golang.org/issue/49522)
  - commented
- **net: make LookupCNAME consistent between Unix and Windows, document** [#50101](https://golang.org/issue/50101)
  - added to minutes
- **reflect: add \`Value.CallInto\`** [#49340](https://golang.org/issue/49340)
  - discussion ongoing
- **runtime: enable WER dumps for Windows under certain circumstances** [#49471](https://golang.org/issue/49471)
  - discussion ongoing
- **spec: safe multidimensional array conversion** [#50118](https://golang.org/issue/50118)
  - added to minutes
- **time: export Location.lookup() as Location.Lookup()** [#50062](https://golang.org/issue/50062)
  - added to minutes

  - commented
- **x/crypto/ssh: add NewSharedClientConn** [#32958](https://golang.org/issue/32958)
  - discussion ongoing
